$This game was moved from Yankee Stadium due to structural problems at Yankee Stadium; a steel beam fell into the seats on April 13, causing two postponements and this site change
ej,randw001,C,scotd901,Balls and strikes Yankees coach Willie Randolph ejected by HP umpire Dale Scott sometime in game

$Chad Curtis called for interference

ej,benia001,P,cobld901,Intentional HBP ej,milla001,P,cobld901,Bench-clearing brawl after Benitez HBP ej,lloyg001,P,cobld901,Bench-clearing brawl after Benitez HBP ej,nelsj001,P,cobld901,Bench-clearing brawl after Benitez HBP ej,strad001,P,cobld901,Bench-clearing brawl after Benitez HBP Armando Benitez ejected for hitting Tino Martinez; Benitez threw his glove down and seemed to challenge the Yankee dugout; Graeme Lloyd ran in from the Yankees bullpen and charged at Benitez; both benches cleared and a 10-minute brawl ensued; the group moved towards the Orioles dugout at which point Darryl Strawberry threw a punch at Benitez; Strawberry missed and ended up in the dugout; Alan Mills hit Strawberry on the face, who was restrained by Orioles coach Eddie Murray, Cal Ripken and Yankees manager Joe Torre; Benitez, Mills, Lloyd, Jeff Nelson and Strawberry ejected by HP umpire Drew Coble
$Roberto Alomar made a great stop behind the 2B bag and tried a behind-the-back toss to SS Mike Bordick
$Cal Ripken's throw sailed into the runner; Roberto Alomar, covering 1B on the bunt, made no effort to catch it

ej,millr801,M,fordd901,Surhoff's ejection ej,surhb001,P,fordd901,Throwing ball in stands $Orioles LF B.J. Surhoff and manager Ray Miller ejected by 3B umpire Dale Ford; Surhoff threw the baseball into the stands after making the inning-ending catch; Ford ejected Surhoff for not giving the ball to the arbiter; Miller was ejected for protesting Surhoff's ejection
